```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(mapdata)
library(maptools)
library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)
library(ggspatial)
```

```{r}
state <- map_data("state")
Ch <- data.frame("x" = -84.133333, "y" = 35.557778)
rotary_point <- data.frame("x" = -87.271600, "y" = 36.501317)
cheatham_point <- data.frame("x" = -87.063088, "y" = 36.188858)
schiller_point <- data.frame("x" = -87.314360, "y" = 36.437066)

ggplot() + geom_polygon(data = state, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group),
                        fill = "white", color="black") + 
           geom_point(data = Ch, aes(x=x,y=y), color="gray", size=4) +
           geom_point(data = schiller_point, aes(x=x,y=y), color="black", size=3) + 
           geom_point(data = rotary_point, aes(x=x,y=y), color="red") +
           geom_point(data = cheatham_point, aes(x=x,y=y), color="green") +
  coord_fixed(xlim = c(-88, -81.8),  ylim = c(34.8, 37), ratio = 1.2) + 
  xlab("Longitude") + ylab("Latitude") + ggtitle("Algae Collection Sites, TN")
```
